video.title: Texas Flip and Move
video.synopsis: Three teams of entrepreneurs compete to be the best house flippers in Texas, buying, moving, renovating and selling homes in record-breaking time.

episodes.synopsis: Three teams of Texas real estate developers bid on houses with an eye toward flipping them, but each home must be relocated before work can begin.
episodes.title: Old Houses Get New Addresses

episodes.synopsis: Wooded property makes the Snow sisters' future woman cave a tough move, and Cody devises a solution for a house with a strange floor plan.
episodes.title: Woman Cave vs. Home Office

episodes.synopsis: The Slays disagree on what to do with a cabin they've won, and Randy butts heads with designer Travis Lewis over renovation costs.
episodes.title: Glam Cabin vs. Rooster Reno

episodes.synopsis: The Snow sisters revamp a house that was once a telephone operator HQ, and bidding gets out of hand on a ranch-style home that everyone wants.
episodes.title: Historic Telephone House Flip

episodes.synopsis: The Snows bet Randy that they'll make more for their shipping container-turned-house than he will with his old schoolhouse-turned-studio loft.
episodes.title: The Bet: Container vs. Loft

episodes.synopsis: Cody wins a house for $500 and discovers that he might have overpaid, while Randy wins a home with a great exterior but bizarre features inside.
episodes.title: Hardwood House vs. Disaster

episodes.synopsis: The Snow sisters are split on whether a cottage they won is worth the price, while Randy chooses to leave a tiny home addition on wheels as a novelty.
episodes.title: Quaint Cottage vs. Tiny House

episodes.synopsis: The Slays craft a large unused space into a walk-in closet fit for a celebrity, and the Snow sisters' gamble on a long-vacant house pays off.
episodes.title: Custom Bling Closet Remodel

episodes.synopsis: The Snow sisters are pleased to find that a long-vacant house is in good condition, and the Slays turn a metal school building into a residence.
episodes.title: School Building vs. Quick Flip
